about_the_game:
Life is like a play. Who is an actor? Who is an onlooker? Who is writing behind the scenes? If this is a comedy, why is my laughter full of tears?
If this is a tragedy, why is there no end?

"Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes" is the 5th work in the "Paper Bride' series. Our cast from Zangling Village return to the stage to welcome players back to the world of paper bride...

We have once again integrated more Chinese folk lore as the story continues to unfold and new characters take stage. Experience the joys and woes of our cast in this world steeped in folk tradition shrouded in dreams and illusions.

New Features:
☯Rich Folk Lore: We have consulted experts to bring you more in-depth and historically accurate folk lore!
☯New Puzzles: We always strive to create new challenges for players with each installment, such a new mechanic for solving puzzles with your phone!
☯Improved Graphics: This chapter is our most detailed work yet! A gorgeous cast, rich environments, and more animations await!
☯The Plot Thickens: Lines blur between dreams and reality. What is real? What is staged? Only you can find out.
detailed_description:
Contact us

Follow our official accounts for more information. Facebook: @gamefpscom Twitter: @gamefpscom Discord：https://discord.gg/kPNcQB4FdC


About the Game

Life is like a play. Who is an actor? Who is an onlooker? Who is writing behind the scenes? If this is a comedy, why is my laughter full of tears? If this is a tragedy, why is there no end? "Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes" is the 5th work in the "Paper Bride' series. Our cast from Zangling Village return to the stage to welcome players back to the world of paper bride... We have once again integrated more Chinese folk lore as the story continues to unfold and new characters take stage. Experience the joys and woes of our cast in this world steeped in folk tradition shrouded in dreams and illusions. New Features: ☯Rich Folk Lore: We have consulted experts to bring you more in-depth and historically accurate folk lore! ☯New Puzzles: We always strive to create new challenges for players with each installment, such a new mechanic for solving puzzles with your phone! ☯Improved Graphics: This chapter is our most detailed work yet! name: Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Paper Bride 5 Two Lifetimes" is the 5th work in the "Paper Bride' series. Our cast from Zangling Village return to the stage to welcome players back to the world of paper bride...
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
